授業の概要・背景: Juvenile literature is purposefully selected as a course material so that you can read authentic English enjoyably, learn rhetoric, and discuss the contents in depth.

- A computer/tablet is needed for in-class writing.
- Students specially permitted to enroll online will participate in-class zoom sessions.
